sentences.en: Although her illness is serious, her condition is beginning to stabilize.
sentences.cn: 虽然她病得很重，但病情正开始趋于稳定。

sentences.en: Around 1910 motorized carriages were beginning to replace horse-drawn cabs.
sentences.cn: 大约从1910年起，机动车开始取代马车。

sentences.en: Could we start at the beginning ? Tell me where you first met him.
sentences.cn: 我们从头讲起好吗？告诉我，你是在哪里认识他的？

sentences.en: Even the European dream is beginning to turn sour.
sentences.cn: 甚至连欧洲之梦都开始破灭了。

sentences.en: Frankly, Thomas, this question of your loan is beginning to worry me.
sentences.cn: 老实讲，托马斯，你贷款的问题开始让我担心了。

sentences.en: From the beginning of my career as a journalist, I’ve been writing about gender issues.
sentences.cn: 从我一开始干记者这一行，我就写性别议题的题材。

sentences.en: He rose from humble beginnings to great wealth.
sentences.cn: 他出身卑微，如今已腰缠万贯。

sentences.en: I feel like I’ve been offered a new beginning .
sentences.cn: 我感觉好像有了一个重新开始的机会。

sentences.en: I opposed it from the very beginning .
sentences.cn: 我一开始就反对。

sentences.en: I opposed it from the very beginning.
sentences.cn: 我一开始就反对。

sentences.en: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning .
sentences.cn: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.en: I said he would cause trouble, right from the beginning.
sentences.cn: 我一开始就说过，他会惹事。

sentences.en: I think I have the beginnings of a cold.
sentences.cn: 我感觉要感冒了。

sentences.en: I thought he loved me; perhaps he did in the beginning .
sentences.cn: 我以为他爱我，也许开始时他确实是爱我的。

sentences.en: It was in the beginning, when we were still ironing out problems.
sentences.cn: 那是在刚开始，我们还在着力解决问题。

sentences.en: O.K. I'll sign off. We'll talk at the beginning of the week.
sentences.cn: 好，就说到这儿吧，下周初我们再谈。

sentences.en: People were beginning to attribute superhuman qualities to him.
sentences.cn: 人们开始觉得他超人一等。

sentences.en: Prices have climbed by 21% since the beginning of the year.
sentences.cn: 年初以来，物价已经上涨了21%。

sentences.en: Steam the carrots until they are just beginning to be tender.
sentences.cn: 将胡萝卜蒸至刚好变软。

sentences.en: That chance meeting marked the beginning of a long and happy relationship.
sentences.cn: 那次邂逅展开了一段长久而幸福的关系。

sentences.en: The debate seems, in retrospect, to have been fixed from the beginning.
sentences.cn: 回想起来，这场辩论好像从一开始就被人操纵了。

sentences.en: The door was beginning to buckle from the intense heat.
sentences.cn: 门在高温高热下开始变形。

sentences.en: The presidency is beginning to appear a political irrelevance.
sentences.cn: 总统一职似乎正在沦为政治上的摆设。

sentences.en: The signs of an economic revival are only just beginning.
sentences.cn: 经济复苏的迹象刚刚开始显现。

sentences.en: The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end .
sentences.cn: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.en: The whole trip was a disaster from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 旅途从头到尾都在出乱子。

sentences.en: There’s a short poem at the beginning of every chapter.
sentences.cn: 每一章的开头都有一首短诗。

sentences.en: This is just the beginning of a new and different life for you.
sentences.cn: 这只是你新的别样生活的开始。

sentences.en: This kind of living was beginning to fray her nerves.
sentences.cn: 这种生活开始让她神经紧张。

sentences.en: We are beginning to have some insight into drug therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们开始对药物治疗有了一些深入了解。

phrases.tran_cn: 首先；从一开始；起初；从头开始
最初；就在刚刚开始；在刚开始的时候；起初；在一开始
从一开始；从开始到现在；从开始一直
预示最后结果或败局的先兆

trans.tran_cn: 开始，开端，开头，初期，初期
trans.tran_en: the start or first part of an event, story, period of time etc
